title: Pseudouridine and N1-methylpseudouridine as potent nucleotide analogues for RNA therapy and vaccine development
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00022F, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lyana L. Y. Ho, Gabriel H. A. Schiess, Pâmella Miranda, Gerald Weber, Kira Astakhova
N1-Methylpseudouridine, and its “parent” analogue pseudouridine, are potent nucleotide analogues for RNA therapy and vaccine development.
